statements: SELECT * FROM account_balances
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 101
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE last_updated < '2021-09-30'
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 100
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance ASC, last_updated DESC
SELECT MAX(balance) AS highest_balance, MIN(balance) AS lowest_balance FROM account_balances
SELECT account_id, AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 5000
SELECT * FROM account_balance;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE account_id = 3;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) FROM account_balance GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balance GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM savings_activity WHERE activity_type='Deposit' GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM savings_activity GROUP BY account_id HAVING activity_count >= 3 ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM savings_activity WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM account_balance_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT account_id, change_amount, change_timestamp FROM account_balance_changes WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM unusual_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent';
SELECT * FROM savings_activities WHERE savings_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY savings_timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, savings_type, savings_amount FROM savings_activities WHERE account_id = 200 ORDER BY savings_amount ASC;
SELECT account_id, change_amount FROM account_balance_changes WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM savings_activities WHERE savings_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY savings_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, change_amount, change_type FROM account_balance_changes WHERE change_type = 'Withdrawal' AND change_amount > 1000 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT account_id, savings_amount FROM savings_activities WHERE savings_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY savings_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM unusual_activities WHERE account_id = 500 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM account_balance_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT balance, change FROM account_balance_changes WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM savings_activities WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT account_id, activity_description FROM unusual_activities WHERE account_id = 2002 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_type, log_message FROM monitoring_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balance_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, balance, change FROM account_balance_changes WHERE balance < 0.0
SELECT * FROM savings_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Deposit' AND amount > 1000.0 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC
SELECT account_id, activity_description FROM unusual_activities WHERE LENGTH(activity_description) > 50
SELECT log_id, account_id, log_type FROM monitoring_logs WHERE log_type = 'Warning'
SELECT * FROM account_balance_changes;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_savings;
SELECT id, activity_type, description FROM unusual_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, is_active FROM account_status WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT account_id, verification_code FROM account_verification WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM account_balance_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, balance, reason FROM account_balance_changes WHERE balance > 1000 AND reason LIKE '%overdraft%' ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, balance, reason FROM account_balance_changes WHERE reason IS NOT NULL AND balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, balance, reason FROM account_balance_changes WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM account_balance_changes GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 500 ORDER BY average_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
